observation: I can see a country/region selection page with a dropdown that shows 'Select' as placeholder text. There are many countries listed below in the dropdown that has been opened, including Indonesia which I previously selected. I can see countries like Afghanistan, Albania, Algeria, etc. at the top of the list. I need to select a country to proceed with the sign-up flow.
reasoning: As an elderly user, I need to select a country from this dropdown. I can see many countries are available in the list. Since I'm looking for a country that's likely to be accepted by this financial platform, I'll choose Australia which is a stable country and appears early in the alphabetical list. I can see Australia is element 71 in the list.
ux_issues: The country dropdown list is very long and could be overwhelming for elderly users
Small text size in the country list may be difficult to read
No search functionality visible to help find countries quickly

dual_diagnosis.visual_observation: The dropdown menu is not visible in either screenshot. The country/region field still shows 'Select' placeholder text and the dropdown appears to be closed in both BEFORE and AFTER screenshots.
dual_diagnosis.diagnosis: The tap action on Australia country option did not execute properly. The dropdown menu was not opened to show country options, so the Australia option could not be selected.
